name: CMAltimeter
desc: An object that initiates the delivery of altitude-related changes.

items.name: class func isAbsoluteAltitudeAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the current device reports changes in the absolute altitude.

items.name: class func isRelativeAltitudeAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the current device supports generating data for relative altitude changes.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to retrieve altimeter data.

items.name: enum CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: func startAbsoluteAltitudeUpdates(to: OperationQueue, withHandler: CMAbsoluteAltitudeHandler)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of absolute altitude data to the specified handler.

items.name: func stopAbsoluteAltitudeUpdates()
items.desc: Stops the delivery of absolute altitude data for this altimeter object.

items.name: typealias CMAbsoluteAltitudeHandler
items.desc: A block for receiving absolute altitude data.

items.name: func startRelativeAltitudeUpdates(to: OperationQueue, withHandler: CMAltitudeHandler)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of relative altitude data to the specified handler.

items.name: func stopRelativeAltitudeUpdates()
items.desc: Stops the delivery of relative altitude data for the altimeter object.

items.name: typealias CMAltitudeHandler
items.desc: A block for receiving relative altitude data.
